name: tfc-pay-react
description: TFC Pay Mobile App - Sharable React UI for Android APK Development

scripts.android:init: npx cap init "TFC Pay" com.tfcpay.app --web-dir dist && npx cap add android
scripts.android:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:run: npm run build && npx cap run android
scripts.apk:build: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
